Reviews.Content: value im sorry family joke suite yes suite size indeed roomy furniture tacky decor outdated obviously major renovation wrecking ball heater unit noisy blew air directly sleeping shock continental 745 am travelling family greeted empty breakfast cubicle mean banana gently inquired receptionist flustered hurriedly rushed locked closet handed 6 packaged muffins offered milk desk food shop free passed pass rodeway inn time travelling ahem price
